Name: Sex Adventures - The Bar Hookup
About the game: About the game An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of twenty-three years old Luiza hooking up with her very big and very cocky customer in the bathroom of the empty college bar she’s working at. Visual Novel Description It’s a late spring night, and Luiza Kyle is bored to death. She hates this time of the year. Her usual clientele – the wild girls and boys living in the college campus just outside the bar’s door, are long gone. Either at their homes with their parents and friends, or simply enjoying the hell out of Spring Break far away from campus, those kids are living their best lives while she’s stuck working the nightshift in a dead Bar every day…cursing the lack of tips and souls to entertain her. She’s almost asleep, when the door opens and a big guy walks in, sporting a huge smile and a walk full of swagger like only a military guy could pull off. He takes a seat at the bar and wakes her up with fancy drinks and sweet promises of trouble. … Will Lou’s night be saved by the cocky stranger? Follow the story and find out… Features - HD renders - Animations
